Text: The video is in Xvid format.

Thanks for the info oozoid2.
That just saved my bandwidth and time downloading.

I foolishly forgot to add the 'xvid' into the filename.  And perhaps for the benefit of newbies I should add a reminder that some players require the the AVI and SRT files have the same base name, so rename the files to, say, INTOUCHABLES.AVI and INTOUCHABLES.SRT before trying to play them.
